elements.title: Select each of the following statements that are true about the application you were served:
elements.description: You may select one or both options.

choices.text: I agree to all the orders requested in the application.
I agree only to part of the order term(s) requested by the other party.
I do not agree with the order as requested by the other party.
I do not agree with the following order term(s) as requested by the other party: (use presented with text box to provide details of the order they do not agree with

elements.name: FAQ
elements.title: What if I want an order about something else?
elements.body: It is not uncommon to need a different, but maybe related, order after being served with an application.</br></br>To ask for an order about something else, you will need to file your own application to bring the issue before the court. You can complete and file the application using this service by selecting Apply for an Order in Step 1 â€“ Getting Started and then select each option you want to ask the court for an order about under the Apply for an Order sub-step.</br></br>You can also try to resolve the issue out of court. Click on Get Help along the top banner of this service for information and resources about where to resolve a family issue out of court.

elements.name: agreeDetails
elements.description: You do not need to use any special wording. Try to be clear about what order or part of the order you agree to.
elements.title: Please provide the details of the order or part of the order that you agree to.

elements.name: agreeAdditionalDetailsYesNo
elements.title: Is there any additional information about the application that you want to provide to the court even though you agree?

elements.name: disAgreeDetails
elements.description: You do not need to use any special wording. The key is to be clear about what order or part of the order you do not agree to and your reason why you do not agree.
elements.title: Please provide the details of the order or part of the order that you do not agree to and explain why you do not agree.
